span.span: When overridden in the derived class, performs the binding of the dynamic invoke operation if the target dynamic object cannot bind.
The representing the result of the binding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當目標實作叫用成員作業為一系列的 get 成員，並叫用，讓目標便會呼叫此方法要求叫用作業的繫結。This method is called by the target when the target implements the invoke member operation as a sequence of get member, and invoke, to let the request the binding of the invoke operation only.

summary.span: 如果目標動態物件無法繫結，則會執行動態叫用成員作業的繫結。

span.span: Performs the binding of the dynamic invoke member operation if the target dynamic object cannot bind.
